description:
J is enraged when he finds out that Hayakawa knew everything and still didn’t save Tenna. Hayakawa tries to dodge J’s attacks and asks him if he truly understands what Tenna wanted. Meanwhile at the school, Haruto and the others look for J and end up at the greenhouse. They find Hikari and the injured Holmes and Watson on the ground. Akira was on a delivery, but tries to get more information about Mikuni for Hayakawa.
Source: crunchyroll
